Html:
Hello,

I need to convert a stream of linear data (48khz, 16 bits per sample and 1 channel) recieved at one machine through a multicast connection to G711 or G729 format, in order to encapsulate and sent to another machine using RTP protocol.

I would need to do that conversion online, it means, while I am receiving the raw data, convert some amount of data and send again with the new format.

Could it be achieved easyly with NAudio library?

Thanks and best regards,

Enric

NAudio can encode audio using any codec on your machine. Windows comes with a G711 encoder and there is also one built into NAudio. Please read my article here for a thorough overview of format conversion in NAudio:
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/501521/How-to-convert-between-most-audio-formats-in-NET

Mark
